channel.title: Npc
channel.description: Okay so I add a random event and when the npc kills the player it will remain there and you can't do anything. Is there anyway to make the NPC dissappear. Here is then end of my code for the event. [code] } else if(c.combatLevel == 126) { Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, 424, c.getX(), c.getY()-1, 0, 0, 120, 18, 210, 210, true, false);[/code] Thanks.

item.title: Npc
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Perhaps set it so it resets npc’s?

item.title: Npc
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Okay so I add a random event and when the npc kills the player it will remain there and you can’t do anything.
Is there anyway to make the NPC dissappear.
Here is then end of my code for the event.

} else if(c.combatLevel == 126) { Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, 424, c.getX(), c.getY()-1, 0, 0, 120, 18, 210, 210, true, false);
Thanks.
